JF+F8R CHORD SEQUENCER



#1
TR.P 1
Y FADER O
A N.CS * X 12 0 Y PRM
JF.NOTE A V 5

#2
PROB 0: BREAK
SKIP 2: BREAK
TR.P 2
B N.CS 0 0 X PRM
JF.NOTE B V 5

#3
SKIP 16: BREAK
TR.P 3
C N.CS * X 12 0 R 1
JF.NOTE C V 5

#4
SKIP 32: BREAK
TR.P 4
X RND 2

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
L 1 8: $ I

#I
JF.MODE 1; SYNC 0
M 200
L 1 8: FADER.SCALE I 1 7
O.MIN 1; O.MAX 8
R.MIN 1; R.MAX 7
PARAM.SCALE 0 3

#P

1	1	1	1
